overview: While looking for his concert outfit, Alexander will meet two refugees that his roommate had housed the day before. Meeting the other, Alex will become aware of the derisory aspect of his quest.

production_companies.name: Médiadiffusion - Atelier de Production de l'IAD

tagline: Alexandre meets Jalal and Akram, two refugees who were housed by his roommate the day before.
title: Akram
